original: Majjhima Nikāya 45
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Cūḷadhammasamādānasutta
analyzed: cūḷa dhamma samādāna sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi:
analyzed: tatra kho bhagavā bhikkhū āmantesi

original: “bhikkhavo”ti.
analyzed: bhikkhavaḥ ti

original: “Bhadante”ti te bhikkhū bhagavato paccassosuṁ.
analyzed: bhadanta iti te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “cattārimāni, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānāni.
analyzed: cattāri imāni bhikkhave dhamma samādānāni

original: Katamāni cattāri?
analyzed: katamāni cattāri

original: Atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhaṁ āyatiṁ dukkhavipākaṁ;
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna sukham āyatim dukkha vipāka

original: atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhañceva āyatiñca dukkhavipākaṁ;
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna dukkham ca iva āyatiñca dukkha vipāka

original: atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhaṁ āyatiṁ sukhavipākaṁ;
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna dukkham āyatim sukha vipāka

original: atthi, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhañceva āyatiñca sukhavipākaṁ.
analyzed: atthi bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna sukham ca iva āyatim ca sukha vipāka

original: Katamañca, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhaṁ āyatiṁ dukkhavipākaṁ?
analyzed: katamat ca bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna sukham āyatim dukkha vipāka

original: Santi, bhikkhave, eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṁvādino evaṁdiṭṭhino:
analyzed: santi bhikkhave eke samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ eva vādinaḥ eva diṭṭhinaḥ

original: ‘natthi kāmesu doso’ti.
analyzed: natthi kāmesu doso ti

original: Te kāmesu pātabyataṁ āpajjanti.
analyzed: te kāmesu pātabyatam āpajjanti

original: Te kho moḷibaddhāhi paribbājikāhi paricārenti.
analyzed: te kho moḷibaddhāhi paribbājikāhi paricārenti

original: Te evamāhaṁsu:
analyzed: te

original: ‘kiṁsu nāma te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā kāmesu anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānā kāmānaṁ pahānamāhaṁsu, kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapenti?
analyzed: kisu nāma te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā kāmesu anāgata bhayam sampassamānā kāmānam pahānam āhasu kāmānam pariññam paññapenti

original: Sukho imissā paribbājikāya taruṇāya mudukāya lomasāya bāhāya samphasso’ti te kāmesu pātabyataṁ āpajjanti.
analyzed: sukhaḥ imissā paribbājikāya taruṇāya mudukāya lomasāya bāhāya samphasso ti te kāmesu pātabyatam āpajjanti

original: Te kāmesu pātabyataṁ āpajjitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti.
analyzed: te kāmesu pātabyatam āpajjitvā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjanti

original: Te tattha dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayanti.
analyzed: te tattha dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayanti

original: Te evamāhaṁsu:
analyzed: te

original: ‘idaṁ kho te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā kāmesu anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānā kāmānaṁ pahānamāhaṁsu,
analyzed: idam kho te bhontaḥ samaṇa brāhmaṇā kāmesu anāgata bhayam sampassamānā kāmānam pahānam āhasu

original: kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapenti, ime hi mayaṁ kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ dukkhā tibbā kharā
analyzed: kāmānam pariññam paññapenti ime hi mayam kāma hetu kāma nidānam dukkhā tibbā kharā

original: kaṭukā vedanā vedayāmā’ti.
analyzed: kaṭukāḥ vedanāḥ vedayāma ati

original: Seyyathāpi, bhikkhave, gimhānaṁ pacchime māse māluvāsipāṭikā phaleyya.
analyzed: sā iyyathā api bhikkhave gimhānam pacchime māse māluvāsi pāṭikā phaleyya

original: Atha kho taṁ, bhikkhave, māluvābījaṁ aññatarasmiṁ sālamūle nipateyya.
analyzed: atha kho ta bhikkhave māluvā bījam aññatarasmim sāla mūle nipateyya

original: Atha kho, bhikkhave, yā tasmiṁ sāle adhivatthā devatā sā bhītā saṁviggā santāsaṁ āpajjeyya.
analyzed: atha kho bhikkhave yā tasmin sāle adhivatthā devatā sā bhītā sa viggā santāsam āpajjeyya

original: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tasmiṁ sāle adhivatthāya devatāya mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā ārāmadevatā
analyzed: atha kho bhikkhave tasmin sāle adhivatthāya devatāya mitta amaccāḥ ñāti sālohitāḥ ārāma devatā

original: vanadevatā rukkhadevatā osadhitiṇavanappatīsu adhivatthā devatā saṅgamma samāgamma evaṁ samassāseyyuṁ:
analyzed: vana devatā rukkha devatā osadhi tiṇa vanappatīsu adhivatthāḥ devatāḥ saṅgamma samāgamma evam samassāseyyu

original: ‘mā bhavaṁ bhāyi, mā bhavaṁ bhāyi;
analyzed: mā bhavam bhāyi mā bhavam bhāyi

original: appeva nāmetaṁ māluvābījaṁ moro vā gileyya, mago vā khādeyya, davaḍāho vā ḍaheyya, vanakammikā vā uddhareyyuṁ, upacikā vā uṭṭhaheyyuṁ, abījaṁ vā panassā’ti.
analyzed: appā iva nāma etam māluvā bījam moraḥ vā gileyya magaḥ vā khādeyya dava ḍāhaḥ vā ḍaheyya vanakammikā vā uddhareyyu upacikāḥ vā uṭṭhaheyyu abījam vā panassa ati

original: Atha kho taṁ, bhikkhave, māluvābījaṁ neva moro gileyya, na mago khādeyya, na davaḍāho
analyzed: atha kho ta bhikkhave māluvā bījam na iva moraḥ gileyya na magaḥ khādeyya na davaḍāho

original: ḍaheyya, na vanakammikā uddhareyyuṁ, na upacikā uṭṭhaheyyuṁ, bījañca panassa taṁ
analyzed: ḍaheyya na vanakammikāḥ uddhareyyu na upacikāḥ uṭṭhaheyyu bījam ca panassa

original: pāvussakena meghena abhippavuṭṭhaṁ sammadeva viruheyya.
analyzed: pāvussakena meghena abhippavuṭṭham sammat eva viruheyya

original: Sāssa māluvālatā taruṇā mudukā lomasā vilambinī, sā taṁ sālaṁ upaniseveyya.
analyzed: sā assa māluvā latā taruṇā mudukā lomasā vilambinī sā tam sālam upaniseveyya

original: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tasmiṁ sāle adhivatthāya devatāya evamassa:
analyzed: atha kho bhikkhave tasmin sāle adhivatthāya devatāya evam assa

original: ‘kiṁsu nāma te bhonto mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā ārāmadevatā vanadevatā rukkhadevatā
analyzed: kisu nāma te bhonto mitta amaccāḥ ñāti sālohitāḥ ārāma devatāḥ vana devatāḥ rukkha devatā

original: osadhitiṇavanappatīsu adhivatthā devatā māluvābīje anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānā saṅgamma
analyzed: osadhi tiṇa vanappatīsu adhivatthā devatā māluvā bīje anāgata bhayam sampassamānā saṅgamma

original: samāgamma evaṁ samassāsesuṁ:
analyzed: evam samassāsesu

original: “mā bhavaṁ bhāyi mā bhavaṁ bhāyi,
analyzed: mā bhavam bhāyi mā bhavam bhāyi

original: appeva nāmetaṁ māluvābījaṁ moro vā gileyya, mago vā khādeyya, davaḍāho vā ḍaheyya, vanakammikā vā uddhareyyuṁ, upacikā vā uṭṭhaheyyuṁ, abījaṁ vā panassā”ti;
analyzed: appā iva nāma etam māluvā bījam moraḥ vā gileyya magaḥ vā khādeyya dava ḍāhaḥ vā ḍaheyya vanakammikā vā uddhareyyu upacikāḥ vā uṭṭhaheyyu abījam vā panassa ati

original: sukho imissā māluvālatāya taruṇāya mudukāya lomasāya vilambiniyā samphasso’ti.
analyzed: sukhaḥ imissā māluvālatāya taruṇāya mudukāya lomasāya vilambiniyā samphasso ti

original: Sā taṁ sālaṁ anuparihareyya.
analyzed: sā tam sālam anuparihareyya

original: Sā taṁ sālaṁ anupariharitvā upari viṭabhiṁ kareyya.
analyzed: sā tam sālam anupariharitvā upari viṭabhim kareyya

original: Upari viṭabhiṁ karitvā oghanaṁ janeyya.
analyzed: upari viṭabhim karitvā oghanam janeyya

original: Oghanaṁ janetvā ye tassa sālassa mahantā mahantā khandhā te padāleyya.
analyzed: oghanam janetvā ye tassa sālassa mahantā mahantā khandhā te padāleyya

original: Atha kho, bhikkhave, tasmiṁ sāle adhivatthāya devatāya evamassa:
analyzed: atha kho bhikkhave tasmin sāle adhivatthāya devatāya evam assa

original: ‘idaṁ kho te bhonto mittāmaccā ñātisālohitā ārāmadevatā vanadevatā rukkhadevatā osadhitiṇavanappatīsu
analyzed: idam kho te bhonto mitta amaccāḥ ñāti sālohitāḥ ārāma devatāḥ vana devatāḥ rukkha devatāḥ osadhi tiṇa vanappatīsu

original: adhivatthā devatā māluvābīje anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānā saṅgamma samāgamma evaṁ samassāsesuṁ:
analyzed: adhivatthā devatā māluvā bīje anāgata bhayam sampassamānā saṅgamma samāgamma evam samassāsesu

original: “mā bhavaṁ bhāyi mā bhavaṁ bhāyi, appeva nāmetaṁ māluvābījaṁ moro vā gileyya, mago
analyzed: mā bhavam bhāyi mā bhavam bhāyi appā iva nāma etam māluvābījam moraḥ vā gileyya mago

original: vā khādeyya, davaḍāho vā ḍaheyya, vanakammikā vā uddhareyyuṁ, upacikā vā uṭṭhaheyyuṁ
analyzed: vā khādeyya dava ḍāhaḥ vā ḍaheyya vanakammikāḥ vā uddhareyyu upacikāḥ vā uṭṭhaheyyu

original: abījaṁ vā panassā”ti.
analyzed: abījam vā panassā ti

original: Yañcāhaṁ māluvābījahetu dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayāmī’ti.
analyzed: yat ca aham māluvā bīja hetu dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayāmi iti

original: Evameva kho, bhikkhave, santi eke samaṇabrāhmaṇā evaṁvādino evaṁdiṭṭhino ‘natthi kāmesu doso’ti.
analyzed: evam eva kho bhikkhave santi eke samaṇa brāhmaṇāḥ eva vādinaḥ eva diṭṭhinaḥ na atthi kāmesu doso ti

original: Te kāmesu pātabyataṁ āpajjanti.
analyzed: te kāmesu pātabyatam āpajjanti

original: Te moḷibaddhāhi paribbājikāhi paricārenti.
analyzed: te moḷibaddhāhi paribbājikāhi paricārenti

original: Te evamāhaṁsu:
analyzed: te

original: ‘kiṁsu nāma te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā kāmesu anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānā kāmānaṁ pahānamāhaṁsu, kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapenti?
analyzed: kisu nāma te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā kāmesu anāgata bhayam sampassamānā kāmānam pahānam āhasu kāmānam pariññam paññapenti

original: Sukho imissā paribbājikāya taruṇāya mudukāya lomasāya bāhāya samphasso’ti.
analyzed: sukhaḥ imissā paribbājikāya taruṇāya mudukāya lomasāya bāhāya samphasso ti

original: Te kāmesu pātabyataṁ āpajjanti.
analyzed: te kāmesu pātabyatam āpajjanti

original: Te kāmesu pātabyataṁ āpajjitvā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjanti.
analyzed: te kāmesu pātabyatam āpajjitvā kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjanti

original: Te tattha dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayanti.
analyzed: te tattha dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayanti

original: Te evamāhaṁsu:
analyzed: te

original: ‘idaṁ kho te bhonto samaṇabrāhmaṇā kāmesu anāgatabhayaṁ sampassamānā kāmānaṁ pahānamāhaṁsu, kāmānaṁ pariññaṁ paññapenti.
analyzed: idam kho te bhonto samaṇa brāhmaṇā kāmesu anāgata bhayam sampassamānā kāmānam pahānam āhasu kāmānam pariññam paññapenti

original: Ime hi mayaṁ kāmahetu kāmanidānaṁ dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayāmā’ti.
analyzed: ime hi mayam kāma hetu kāma nidānam dukkhā tibbā kharā kaṭukā vedanā vedayāma ati

original: Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhaṁ āyatiṁ dukkhavipākaṁ.
analyzed: idam vuccati bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna sukham āyatim dukkha vipāka

original: Katamañca, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhañceva āyatiñca dukkhavipākaṁ?
analyzed: kataman ca bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna dukkham ca iva āyatiñca dukkha vipāka

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco acelako hoti muttācāro hatthāpalekhano, naehibhaddantiko, natiṭṭhabhaddantiko, nābhihaṭaṁ, na uddissakataṁ, na nimantanaṁ sādiyati,
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ acelakaḥ hoti mutta ācāraḥ hattha apalekhanaḥ na ehibhaddantikaḥ na tiṭṭhabhaddantikaḥ na abhihaṭa na na nimantanam sādiyati

original: so na kumbhimukhā paṭiggaṇhāti, na kaḷopimukhā paṭiggaṇhāti, na eḷakamantaraṁ, na
analyzed: saḥ na kumbhi mukhā paṭiggaṇhāti na kaḷopi mukhā paṭiggaṇhāti na na

original: daṇḍamantaraṁ, na musalamantaraṁ, na dvinnaṁ bhuñjamānānaṁ, na gabbhiniyā, na pāyamānāya,
analyzed: na musalam antara na dvinnam bhuñjamānāna na gabbhiniyā na pāyamānāya

original: na purisantaragatāya, na saṅkittīsu, na yattha sā upaṭṭhito hoti, na yattha makkhikā
analyzed: na purisa antara gatāya na saṅkittīsu na yattha sā upaṭṭhitaḥ hoti na yattha makkhikā

original: saṇḍasaṇḍacārinī, na macchaṁ, na maṁsaṁ, na suraṁ, na merayaṁ, na thusodakaṁ pivati.
analyzed: saṇḍasaṇḍacārinī na na maccha na masa na sura na meraya na thusā udakam pivati

original: So ekāgāriko vā hoti ekālopiko, dvāgāriko vā hoti dvālopiko …pe… sattāgāriko vā hoti sattālopiko.
analyzed: so ekāgārikaḥ vā hoti ekālopikaḥ dvāgārikaḥ vā hoti dvālopikaḥ pe satta āgārikaḥ vā hoti satta ālopikaḥ

original: Ekissāpi dattiyā yāpeti, dvīhipi dattīhi yāpeti … sattahipi dattīhi yāpeti.
analyzed: ekissā api dattiyā yāpeti dvīhi pi dattīhi yāpeti  sattahi pi dattīhi yāpeti

original: Ekāhikampi āhāraṁ āhāreti, dvīhikampi āhāraṁ āhāreti … sattāhikampi āhāraṁ āhāreti. Iti evarūpaṁ addhamāsikampi pariyāyabhattabhojanānuyogamanuyutto viharati.
analyzed: ekāhikam pi āhāram āhāreti dvīhikam pi āhāram āhāreti  sattāhikam pi āhāram āhāreti iti evarūpam addhamāsikam pi pariyāya bhatta bhojana anuyogam anuyuttaḥ viharati

original: So sākabhakkho vā hoti, sāmākabhakkho vā hoti, nīvārabhakkho vā hoti, daddulabhakkho
analyzed: so sāka bhakkhaḥ vā hoti sāmāka bhakkhaḥ vā hoti nīvāra bhakkhaḥ vā hoti daddula bhakkhaḥ

original: vā hoti, haṭabhakkho vā hoti, kaṇabhakkho vā hoti, ācāmabhakkho vā hoti, piññākabhakkho
analyzed: vā hoti haṭa bhakkhaḥ vā hoti kaṇa bhakkhaḥ vā hoti ācāma bhakkhaḥ vā hoti piññāka bhakkho

original: vā hoti, tiṇabhakkho vā hoti, gomayabhakkho vā hoti, vanamūlaphalāhāro yāpeti pavattaphalabhojī.
analyzed: vā hoti tiṇa bhakkhaḥ vā hoti gomaya bhakkhaḥ vā hoti vana mūla phala āhāraḥ yāpeti pavatta phala bhojī

original: So sāṇānipi dhāreti, masāṇānipi dhāreti, chavadussānipi dhāreti, paṁsukūlānipi dhāreti,
analyzed: saḥ sāṇāni api dhārā iti masāṇāni api dhārā iti chava dussāni api dhārā iti pasu kūlāni api dhārā iti

original: tirīṭānipi dhāreti, ajinampi dhāreti, ajinakkhipampi dhāreti, kusacīrampi dhāreti,
analyzed: tirīṭāni api dhārā iti ajinam pi dhārā iti ajinakkhipam pi dhārā iti kusa cīram pi dhārā iti

original: vākacīrampi dhāreti, phalakacīrampi dhāreti, kesakambalampi dhāreti, vāḷakambalampi
analyzed: vāka cīram pi dhārā iti phalaka cīram pi dhārā iti kesa kambalam pi dhārā iti vāḷa kambalam pi

original: dhāreti, ulūkapakkhampi dhāreti,
analyzed: dhāreti ulūka pakkham pi dhāreti

original: kesamassulocakopi hoti, kesamassulocanānuyogamanuyutto,
analyzed: kesa massu locakaḥ api hoti kesa massu locana anuyogam anuyuttaḥ

original: ubbhaṭṭhakopi hoti, āsanapaṭikkhitto,
analyzed: ubbhaṭṭhakaḥ api hoti āsana paṭikkhittaḥ

original: ukkuṭikopi hoti ukkuṭikappadhānamanuyutto,
analyzed: ukkuṭikaḥ api hoti ukkuṭika padhānam anuyuttaḥ

original: kaṇṭakāpassayikopi hoti, kaṇṭakāpassaye seyyaṁ kappeti,
analyzed: kaṇṭakāpassayikaḥ api hoti kaṇṭakāpassaye seyyam kappeti

original: sāyatatiyakampi udakorohanānuyogamanuyutto viharati.
analyzed: udakorohana anuyogam anuyuttaḥ viharati

original: Iti evarūpaṁ anekavihitaṁ kāyassa ātāpanaparitāpanānuyogamanuyutto viharati.
analyzed: iti evarūpam aneka vihitam kāyassa ātāpana paritāpana anuyogam anuyuttaḥ viharati

original: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati

original: Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhañceva āyatiñca dukkhavipākaṁ.
analyzed: idam vuccati bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna dukkham ca iva āyatim ca dukkha vipāka

original: Katamañca, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhaṁ āyatiṁ sukhavipākaṁ?
analyzed: katamat ca bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna dukkham āyatim sukha vipāka

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyā tibbarāgajātiko hoti, so abhikkhaṇaṁ rāgajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ pakatiyā tibba rāga jātikaḥ hoti saḥ abhikkhaṇam rāga jam dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti

original: pakatiyā tibbadosajātiko hoti, so abhikkhaṇaṁ dosajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
analyzed: pakatiyā tibba dosa jātikaḥ hoti so abhikkhaṇam dosa jam dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti

original: pakatiyā tibbamohajātiko hoti, so abhikkhaṇaṁ mohajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: pakatiyā tibba moha jātikaḥ hoti so abhikkhaṇam moha jam dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti

original: So sahāpi dukkhena, sahāpi domanassena, assumukhopi rudamāno paripuṇṇaṁ parisuddhaṁ brahmacariyaṁ carati.
analyzed: so saha api dukkhena saha api domanassena assu mukhaḥ api rudamānaḥ paripuṇṇam parisuddham brahmacariyam carati

original: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati

original: Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannadukkhaṁ āyatiṁ sukhavipākaṁ.
analyzed: idam vuccati bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna dukkham āyatim sukha vipāka

original: Katamañca, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhañceva āyatiñca sukhavipākaṁ?
analyzed: kataman ca bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna sukham ca iva āyatim ca sukha vipāka

original: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco pakatiyā na tibbarāgajātiko hoti, so na abhikkhaṇaṁ rāgajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
analyzed: idha bhikkhave ekaccaḥ pakatiyā na tibba rāga jātikaḥ hoti saḥ na abhikkhaṇam rāga jam dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti

original: pakatiyā na tibbadosajātiko hoti, so na abhikkhaṇaṁ dosajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti;
analyzed: pakatiyā na tibba dosa jātikaḥ hoti so na abhikkhaṇam dosa jam dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti

original: pakatiyā na tibbamohajātiko hoti, so na abhikkhaṇaṁ mohajaṁ dukkhaṁ domanassaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
analyzed: pakatiyā na tibba moha jātikaḥ hoti so na abhikkhaṇam moha jam dukkham domanassam paṭisavedeti

original: So vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: saḥ vivicca iva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi sa vitakkam sa vicāram viveka jam pīti sukham paṭhamam jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: Vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ …pe…
analyzed: vitakka vicārānam vūpasamāḥ ajjhattam sampasādanam cetasaḥ eka udi bhāvam a vitakkam a vicāram samādhi jam pīti sukham dutiyam jhānam

original: tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ …
analyzed: tatiyam jhānam

original: catutthaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
analyzed: catuttham jhānam upasampajja viharati

original: So kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati

original: Idaṁ vuccati, bhikkhave, dhammasamādānaṁ paccuppannasukhañceva āyatiñca sukhavipākaṁ.
analyzed: idam vuccati bhikkhave dhamma samādānam paccuppanna sukham ca iva āyatim ca sukha vipāka

original: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, cattāri dhammasamādānānī”ti.
analyzed: imāni kho bhikkhave cattāri dhamma samādānāni iti

original: Idamavoca bhagavā.
analyzed: idam avoca bhagavān

original: Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṁ abhinandunti.
analyzed: attamanāḥ te bhikkhū bhagavataḥ bhāsitam abhinandunti

original: Cūḷadhammasamādānasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ pañcamaṁ.
analyzed: cūḷa dhamma samādāna suttam niṭṭhitam pañcama
